> Oh but you will feel so at home at the conference. Can't wait to get there.

brenda

In a message dated 8/6/03 10:17:38 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
abtleo@... writes:

> . And I just left visiting both sets of grandparents,
> neither of whom entirely "get it". So I'm feeling vastly out of step these
> days.
>
>

Oh but you will feel so at home at the conference. Can't wait to get there.
Pam G.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] is unschooling perfect
messages.msgSnippet: ... Probably the environment.  Probably it s also living in a country where homeschooling isn t allowed, so I answer a lot of very basic questions about it ALL
messages.messageBody:
8/6/03 18:13:

> Brenda,
> I have a question. Do you think that is because of the environment? The
> military atmosphere? You are probably the only unschooler and probably one of
> the only homeschoolers there. I remember when we were in Germany, my boys
> were both toddlers then, but I knew no homeschoolers.

Probably the environment. Probably it's also living in a country where
homeschooling isn't allowed, so I answer a lot of very basic questions about
it ALL the time. And I just left visiting both sets of grandparents,
neither of whom entirely "get it". So I'm feeling vastly out of step these
days.

brenda
